Custom3r may have added brand(s) or business(es) which are in the business of Product Repair, Product Servicing and Maintenance which may or may not be "Authorized Service Centers" of the product or service which is requested by the end customer. It is the responsibility of the customer who has requested the said Product or Service to be repaired and/or maintained by a brand or business, to conduct the due diligence of whether the brand or business is fit to handle their customer care service requests or not. Custom3r shall in no way be responsible to any extent for any faulty service, inappropriate action or delay done or any unsatisfactory action of any nature done by any brand or business listed on Custom3r.
